title: Adaniâ€™s $440 million wind power project faces big risk as Sri Lanka to reconsider its approval
description: Sri Lanka's new government, led by Anura Kumara Dissanayake, is reviewing India's Adani Group's wind power project due to concerns about its electricity tariff and potential threats to energy sovereignty. A final decision will follow the November 14 elections, aligning with Dissanayake's campaign promises.
